== Podcasts and books ==

Podcasts with regards to behavioral psychology - hidden biases:

* https://freakonomics.com/archive/
* https://www.schwab.com/resource-center/insights/podcast
* https://freakonomics.com/nsq/

Corresponding books:

* https://freakonomics.com/books/

They are mainly based on research from Kahneman and Tversky. Most notable example
is the book Thinking Fast and Slow. It contains many interesting examples on how
the human brain works and what sort of biases and pitfalls we can fall to

* https://www.amazon.com/Thinking-Fast-Slow-Daniel-Kahneman/dp/0374533555
